name: pages-starter-react-locations
description: An example repository to help users get started with React development on Yext Pages
author: sumo@yext.com

scripts.dev: npm run build:local && yext pages generate-test-data && pages dev
scripts.build: yext pages build && yext pages generate-test-data && yext pages render
scripts.build:serve: npm run build && yext pages serve
scripts.dev:multibrand: npm run build:local && yext pages generate-test-data --hostname locations.brand1.com && pages dev --scope locations.brand1.com
scripts.build:multibrand: yext pages build && yext pages generate-test-data --hostname locations.brand1.com && yext pages render --hostname locations.brand1.com
